CatDescriptText: The Silver Pig was known for good barbecue.  It was located in the Lower Hill.  Here, two men and a woman wearing an apron, presumably the owners, pose behind the counter in front of the Silver Pig sign and a woman eats her barbecue with a side of pie.
TitMainTitle: Two men, and woman wearing floral apron, standing behind counter of The Silver Pig Bar-B-Q restaurant, 2128 Wylie Avenue, Hill District
